title: 使用粘液科技祭坛报错
author: 毒肉肉
txt_content:
使用的是粘液科技汉化版远古工艺
核心版本是1.12.2-Spigot



[Slimefun] Task #157139 for Slimefun v4.1.15 generated an exception
java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: me/mrCookieSlime/CSCoreLibPlugin/general/Particles/MC_1_8/ParticleEffect
        at me.mrCookieSlime.Slimefun.AncientAltar.RitualAnimation.idle(RitualAnimation.java:63) ~[?:?]
        at me.mrCookieSlime.Slimefun.AncientAltar.RitualAnimation.run(RitualAnimation.java:49) ~[?:?]
        at org.bukkit.craftbukkit.v1_12_R1.scheduler.CraftTask.run(CraftTask.java:71) ~[%e6%a0%b8%e5%bf%83.jar:git-Spigot-7754231-94b0980]
        at org.bukkit.craftbukkit.v1_12_R1.scheduler.CraftScheduler.mainThreadHeartbeat(CraftScheduler.java:353) [%e6%a0%b8%e5%bf%83.jar:git-Spigot-7754231-94b0980]
        at net.minecraft.server.v1_12_R1.MinecraftServer.D(MinecraftServer.java:739) [%e6%a0%b8%e5%bf%83.jar:git-Spigot-7754231-94b0980]
        at net.minecraft.server.v1_12_R1.DedicatedServer.D(DedicatedServer.java:406) [%e6%a0%b8%e5%bf%83.jar:git-Spigot-7754231-94b0980]
        at net.minecraft.server.v1_12_R1.MinecraftServer.C(MinecraftServer.java:679) [%e6%a0%b8%e5%bf%83.jar:git-Spigot-7754231-94b0980]
        at net.minecraft.server.v1_12_R1.MinecraftServer.run(MinecraftServer.java:577) [%e6%a0%b8%e5%bf%83.jar:git-Spigot-7754231-94b0980]
        at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) [?:1.8.0_221]
Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: me.mrCookieSlime.CSCoreLibPlugin.general.Particles.MC_1_8.ParticleEffect
        at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source) ~[?:1.8.0_221]
        at org.bukkit.plugin.java.PluginClassLoader.findClass(PluginClassLoader.java:101) ~[%e6%a0%b8%e5%bf%83.jar:git-Spigot-7754231-94b0980]
        at org.bukkit.plugin.java.PluginClassLoader.findClass(PluginClassLoader.java:86) ~[%e6%a0%b8%e5%bf%83.jar:git-Spigot-7754231-94b0980]
        at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) ~[?:1.8.0_221]
        at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) ~[?:1.8.0_221]
        ... 9 more
